text: My daly Moses svyate pysannya, ta nastupni yomu my poslaly inshym kur'yeram, ta my daly Isusu, syn Mary, hlybokykh dyv ta pidtrymav yoho z Svyashchennym Dukh. Tse ne fakt shcho kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav do vas z budʹ shcho vas ne lyubyly, vash ego vyklykayetʹsya vy buty zukhvali? Deyakyy z nykh vy vidkhylyly, ta deyakyy z nykh vy zbyti
